comment: IMO the map itself isn't "misleading" at all, just the context in which others (wrongly) used it. This is an important lesson for cartographers and geographers everywhere, as well as the media and the public! 2/3

This is increasingly important in the age of social media, where an unwary Geographer can post a map and readily have it used out of context. Knowing when to withhold a map is just as important as many other aspects of cartography  3/3
